page.title: 09HOUSEWIFE'S DAY
page.content: At 4:30am David has woken himself and his sister. They end up in bed with us so I get into Gemma's bed. At 6:30 I can hear David downstairs feeding biscuits to the cat so I get up. I make a cup of tea to cheer us up but Mick still goes to work in a bad mood. At breakfast David gets Weetabix everywhere, Gemma leaves hers. Later it calms down so I do some sewing, then a friend drops in for me to cut her childrens' hair; more screams! After lunch the children have a sleep and I mow the lawn. At 3:00 I take them to work with me. 2 hours later while they are messing with tea I dash round like a mad thing tidying up before Mick gets home. I give them a quick flick with a flannel and bed! I rustle up some food for Mick's tea and then I have time to do some sewing before exhaustion and bed at 9:30pm!
